programme.desc: While preparing for her sister's wedding, Addie loses her grandmother's ring in the waters of Hawaii. She soon rediscovers her love of the sea when she hires a scuba diver to help her find it.

programme.title: Bottled With Love
programme.desc: After being stood up on a date, a woman writes down her feelings, places the letter in a bottle, and throws it into the ocean. Months later, a fisherman discovers the message and decides to reach out.

programme.title: October Kiss
programme.desc: After being hired as a nanny by a widowed, work-obsessed man, Poppy teaches the family that unconditional love, family and the joy of everyday occurrences are the most important things in life.
